summary: Contoso Wireless offers a product phone with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 processor, 8GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, 5G connectivity, a fingerprint scanner, facial recognition technology, military-grade encryption, and a one-year warranty. It starts at $699.99 and customers can get a free trial on select products and services. The customer service team is available 24/7 to answer any questions or concerns.
